mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kellin, W. M. S.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: N Wilkinson Lieut Col. Wheeling Aug 22 1861. By Telegraph from Cornwallis " " 1861. We will lack a few of the number of a company but trust to make up the balance in short time and in order to save all we have will you come and muster us into service at Cairo on saturday next answer immediately W.M.S Kellin 44MS.142pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kellin, W. M. S.
Cornwallis, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Wilkinson, Nathan
